FuncDef: The reset flowspec ipv6 statistics command clears statistics about traffic matching the filtering rule in a BGP IPv6 Flow Specification or BGP IPv6 VPN Flow Specification route.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about traffic matching a filtering rule in the BGP IPv6 Flow Specification or BGP IPv6 VPN Flow Specification route of a specified index.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Clears statistics about traffic matching a specified BGP IPv6 Flow Specification route.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To analyze traffic status and running status of BGP IPv6 Flow Specification or BGP IPv6 VPN Flow Specification, you can run the display flowspec statistics command to view statistics about traffic matching a filtering rule in a BGP IPv6 Flow Specification or BGP IPv6 VPN Flow Specification route. When the statistics no longer merit reference in your analysis, run the reset flowspec statistics command to clear the statistics.
